bibl.title: The Roman Shipwreck of Antirhodos Island in the Portus Magnus of Alexandria, Egypt.
International Journal of Nautical Archaeology and Underwater Exploration

bibl.note: Site and excavation. - Date of the ship [built at some point in the 1st century CE or the early years of the 2nd century]. - Construction of the ship. - Wood identification. - Sheathing and sealing of the hull. - Fittings and on board equipment. - Conclusions. - Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.seg: Patrice Sandrin, Alexander Belov & David Fabre, The Roman Shipwreck of Antirhodos Island in the Portus Magnus of Alexandria, Egypt.
IJNA 42 (2013) pp. 44-59, 2 tabl., 12 figg. n./bl. et coul.

Site and excavation. - Date of the ship [built at some point in the 1st century CE or the early years of the 2nd century]. - Construction of the ship. - Wood identification. - Sheathing and sealing of the hull. - Fittings and on board equipment. - Conclusions. - Avec résumé en anglais.
